name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **distributed systems** and **cloud-based architecture**. Proficient in **APIs** development and automated testing strategies. Skilled in **Go** and **Kubernetes**, with a strong foundation in deploying and maintaining cloud-native applications on **AWS** and **Azure**. Demonstrated expertise in building scalable architectures and implementing **Site Reliability Engineering** principles to enhance application performance and reliability.

Extensive experience with a diverse tech stack, including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. An adept problem-solver with hands-on expertise in developing AI/ML-powered platforms that drive predictive analytics and automation. Committed to compliance-driven development and aligning solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
